content: I'm planning to use some of the natural materials from the land itself, like stone and wood, to build the weekend home. Do you think that will be okay with the local regulations? And by the way, I was thinking of getting in touch with my lawyer, Rachel, who helped me with the land purchase, to see if she knows any good contractors in the area. I closed the deal on the land last month, on the 15th, and I'm excited to get started on the project.
